subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Charde Houston scored 23 points as fifth-ranked Connecticut defeated Pittsburgh, 82-68, to secure its 10th consecutive victory and at least a share of the Big East regular-season championship.
snippet: Charde Houston scored 23 points as fifth-ranked Connecticut defeated Pittsburgh, 82-68, to secure its 10th consecutive victory and at least a share of the Big East regular-season championship.
